sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import './styles.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Button, Form, Tab, Tabs } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { GetClientPersonalInfo, GetClientBusinessInfo } from "../../../APIs/AdminPanelApis"; export default function ClientPersonalInfoDisplay({ id }) { const [personalInfo, setPersonalInfo] = useState(); const [businessInfo, setBusinessInfo] = useState(); useEffect(() => { GetClientPersonalInfo(id).then((res) => { setPersonalInfo(res.data.server_response); }) GetClientBusinessInfo(id).then((res) => { setBusinessInfo(res.data.server_response) }) }, []) function updatePersonalInfo() { console.log(fileInput); console.log("updated!"); } const fileInput = useRef("https://freepikpsd.com/file/2019/10/avatar-icon-png-5-Images-PNG-Transparent.png"); // const [newImgPath, setNewImgPath] = useState(); const selectFile = () => { fileInput.current.click(() => { console.log("test") }); // console.log(fileInput.current.click()) // setNewImgPath() // console.log(fileInput.current.value) } return ( <>
Full Name:
Email:
Phone Number:
ID Number:
{/*
*/} {/*
*/}
{personalInfo?.fullName}
Customer ID: {id}
Odoo ID: {personalInfo?.OdooId}
Business Name:
Business Location:
Business Type:
) }
